w_title(mythryl-gtk-slave)dnl
w_doc_id(mythrylgtkslaveman)dnl
w_section(1)dnl
w_author(Michele Bini)dnl
w_man_desc(GTK+ server for Mythryl applications)

! SYNOPSIS

''mythryl-gtk-slave''

! DESCRIPTION

''mythryl-gtk-slave'' is used by Mythryl applications to access GTK+ functionality.

! SEE ALSO

''mythryl'' (1), ''mythryld'' (1), ''build-an-executable-mythryl-heap-image'' (1)

! AUTHOR

This page was written by w_author.
